body:
Comment 4 by **dalensor**: 
If this comes into place please make sure that it has greater speed and flexibility 
than at least the JCP. I have no idea about the Python version but the JCP has a 
monster of politics and agendas.

I vote for Google (rather the Golang core developers) keeping the final say.
If they want the language to flourish then they will have to listen but without the 
weight of some inefficient committee.
